body: Shin Cho was super helpful in fixing my ticket to turn it into a non-moving violation and make sure there are no points on my license. The process was super quick and efficient! Thank you so much for your help!

body: Shin Cho handled my case in a professional and timely manner!  He was quick with updating me on my case and made everything stress-free.  I would recommend Shin to anybody for their legal needs!

body: Dealing with multiple lawyers in the past, I can say in confidence, Shin Cho is THE BEST Lawyer I've ever had. Very efficient, and communicates effectively of what needs to be done. If you want the job done right, Highly HIGHLY Recommend using Mr. Cho's services!

body: Great perseverance and great results. Was with me every step of the way. Would definitely recommend.

body: Shin was friendly, knowledgeable and took care of everything once I hired him. The entire process was stress free on my end and I got the results I was looking for.

name: Debbie S
body: I would highly recommend Shin Cho to anyone in need of a lawyer.  He helped us with a DWI that our son had and we are very pleased with the results.  Shin got these results because he is very thorough.  Rather than take the easy path and â€¦MoreI would highly recommend Shin Cho to anyone in need of a lawyer.  He helped us with a DWI that our son had and we are very pleased with the results.  Shin got these results because he is very thorough.  Rather than take the easy path and accept an initial offer, he took the time to understand the case completely and determine the best way for us to proceed.  He always responded to our questions, didn't nickel and dime on fees, and helped us to stay calm when we were nervous.

name: Emily
body: Shin was confident and knowledgeable while handling my case. He knew exactly what to do and made things happen while keeping my needs/wants in mind. I am more than happy with the results he was able to get. He really does want what is best for you. I would recommend him to anyone! He has gained my trust and respect.

name: Benjamin S
body: Shin was a delight to work with under the circumstances,  but more importantly he really takes the time to go over everything with you in detail, so you've got nothing to worry about. name: Ben A
body: My experience with Shin was great. I originally hired him with a different firm and that is how I got introduced. It was when I had a follow up issue come up a year later that needed attention that I realized that he had moved on from his â€¦MoreMy experience with Shin was great. I originally hired him with a different firm and that is how I got introduced. It was when I had a follow up issue come up a year later that needed attention that I realized that he had moved on from his original firm, but I called him anyway because I was comfortable with him by then. Shin graciously stepped in and sorted out my followup issue pro bono when he could have easily just sent me back to his old firm. That is class! Shin is an excellent up and coming Attorney and I have no doubt that he will do an excellent job helping others with their legal needs. Shin is also always available when you need him, often communicating with me at odd hours and on any day of the week. Very personal service which was a big plus for me.

name: Nancy V
body: I had a great experience with using The Law Office Of Shin Cho , Very professional , communicative and persistent. I was very satisfied in the results of my case. I have and will continue to refer Shin Co in the future  to friends and family.

name: John A
body: I had used Shin Cho for a traffic ticket Issue in Illinois. He was very helpful and I was grateful for the outcome. I will definitely use him again.

name: Mitch C
body: Shin is the most hands on and dedicated lawyer in the area (IMO). He takes the time to really understand your situation completely and thoroughly reviews all facts. He is the one you want in your corner when you're up against the justice system in any scenario.

name: Samantha C
body: I had an excellent experience with Shin. He is very professional and organized. He was able to get me in right away and never had any issues. He always kept me updated with my case, back in 2016, and I was never disappointed with my â€¦MoreI had an excellent experience with Shin. He is very professional and organized. He was able to get me in right away and never had any issues. He always kept me updated with my case, back in 2016, and I was never disappointed with my results. Shin also got my case dropped, which was very satisfying. He was willing to ansser any question with no hesitaion. I would hire him again and recommend anyone to hire him!

name: Joseph O
body: Shin Cho is an amazing attorney. He works extremely hard for his clients and has a proven history of getting fantastic results. I would highly recommend him for any issues you may have.

name: Lissa C
body: Shin is attentive to his clients, thorough in his handling of cases, and very professional. I was grateful to work with him and would return again for future legal counsel.

name: Nedim R
body: Being a personal injury attorney in St. Louis, I do not handle any serious criminal matters. If any of my clients, or family members, do get in trouble with the law, I refer them to the Law Office of Shin Cho. Not only is Shin an â€¦MoreBeing a personal injury attorney in St. Louis, I do not handle any serious criminal matters. If any of my clients, or family members, do get in trouble with the law, I refer them to the Law Office of Shin Cho. Not only is Shin an outstanding attorney, but he genuinely cares about the people. I have personally seen him get cases closed before they ever got filed. That involved being proactive in going with the client to the police station, explaining the facts in the most favorable light to the client, and preventing the case of ever getting filed. If I was in any criminal touble, I would call Shin Cho.

name: Brian W
body: Shin is a great lawyer who works hard for all of his clients. I feel confident recommending Shin to any of my friends or family in need of excellent representation.

name: Almira B
body: A very professional, experienced and knowledgeable criminal defense attorney

name: Braden P
body: Shin is exceptionally professional, really good at listening to your concerns as a client, and helped me a lot with my legal issues. I would highly recommend him and I think he is one of the best young attorneys in St. Louis.

name: Ashley C
body: I would recommend Shin to anyone looking for a good Criminal Defense Attorney. He is always trustworthy and professional.
